code: import axios from"axios";import{onGlobalSuccess,onGlobalError}from"../services/serviceHelper";var api="https://localhost:50001/api/category";var getCategories=function getCategories(){var config={method:"GET",url:api,withCredentials:true,crossdomain:true,headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}};return axios(config).then(onGlobalSuccess).catch(onGlobalError);};var getProductsByCategory=function getProductsByCategory(id){var config={method:"GET",url:"".concat(api,"/").concat(id),withCredentials:true,crossdomain:true,headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}};return axios(config).then(onGlobalSuccess).catch(onGlobalError);};export{getCategories,getProductsByCategory};
